listing.listing_description:
With its ocean views, inviting outdoor living areas and sophisticated interiors, Villa del Corazon will capture your heart. And because it’s close to beaches, tennis, dining and nightlife in downtown Cabo San Lucas and set along a golf course, the property puts you at the heart of Cabo. Sleek rooms in textures like travertine and wood and seven suite-style bedrooms, including one in a separate casita, round out the luxe experience.

Villa del Corazon is laid out around a wide ocean-facing terrace with a heated pool, jetted tub, sunny and shaded lounge areas, an al-fresco dining table, a bar and kitchen area with a gas barbecue and a shower for post-swim rinses. When the sun goes down, head inside to gather around the satellite television, share photos via Wi-Fi, flip on the sound system or select a bottle from the wine fridge.

Dark wood paneling and pale travertine tile make for a modern contrast inside Villa del Corazon. A consistent color scheme of cream and brown gives the open-plan living room, dining room and kitchen a chic, sophisticated feel, while the space’s vaulted ceilings keep it airy and bright. The clean lines of the sofa and armchairs are echoed by the upholstered dining chairs, but the color scheme gets a slight twist in the granite countertops of the fully equipped kitchen.

There are six bedrooms in the main house at Villa del Corazon and one in a separate casita; all seven bedrooms have air conditioning and en-suite bathrooms. In the main house, the master suite has a king bed and ocean view and opens to the pool deck. There are four other bedrooms with king beds, three of which open to a shared terrace, and one bedroom with two king beds. The casita has a bedroom with a king bed that opens to a shared terrace.

Whether you want an active or relaxed vacation, the villa has plenty to offer. It’s located right on the Cabo del Sol Ocean golf course and is 11.3 km from Canchas de Tenis, just over 11.9 km from Tennis Club Pedregal and 12.3 km from Cabo Real Golf Club. Spend a day by the ocean at Tabasco Beach, 9.3 km away, or Médano Beach, 10 km away. Reserve an evening to take in the nightlife in downtown Cabo San Lucas, 6.5 miles from the villa, or spend an afternoon exploring Land’s End, 7 miles away, Cabo del Sol, 8 miles away, or San Jose del Cabo, 14.5 miles away. When it’s time to leave, plan on a 35.1 km trip from Villa del Corazon to Los Cabos International Airport.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Bob Marley’s songs play out in this villa atop rugged honeycombed rock wedged between the Caribbean and a small private inlet. A Boscobel best-kept secret with 3 levels of ocean blue and sail white living space, it is a jewel. Hang out on one of the many ocean-view decks, terraces, and verandahs. Relax in the infinity pool, or grab your fins and snorkels and explore the private water cave and sea cove. As Bob would say: “Don’t worry, be happy.”

Rocksteady Villa faces a protected fish sanctuary, which means snorkeling here is extra special. Spend a day kayaking along the rugged coastline with a guide.

Nights on the water and Rocksteady Villa is right on the water, are magical.

Relax dockside with a fire in the firepit. Romantic lanterns line the walkways. Dine under the trees by candlelight with fresh food from the grill. And feel the romance of this place cast its spell.

Boscobel is in St. Mary Parish. It’s small but full of history. Tour a few remaining banana plantations and great houses preserved here. Buzzing Ocho Rios is not far away. As Bob would say: “Don’t worry, be happy.”

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Experience the wildness of Costa Rica and the peace of mind of a gated community at Villa 8: Terraces at San Martin. Perched above the Pacific in a quiet enclave, this private modern vacation rental offers stunning views over the rainforest to the jungle, not to mention a location close to beaches, national parks, waterfalls and more. Its setting in an exclusive residential area makes it ideal for a laid-back holiday with family or a getaway with friends.

Take in the ocean views from the villa's terrace, which has an infinity pool, plenty of loungers and a barbecue. If available, head to the Elan at Ballena Beach Club, where guests of the Terraces at San Martin are welcome. Inside the villa, a TV and Wi-Fi give you the option of staying connected-but you can always choose the luxury of being unplugged, too.

Watch the sun move across the water or see tropical rainshowers fly up the coast from the villa's L-shaped great room, which wraps around the terrace to offer its own panoramic views. Living and dining areas filled with chic modern pieces make up the legs of the L, and in the center is a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar.

Villa 8 has two bedrooms with king beds, including one with ocean views, and one bedroom with two queen beds. All three bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and, for the warmest nights, both air conditioning and ceiling fans.

Whether you're in Costa Rica to enjoy warm weather with friends, try activities as a family or have an adventurous honeymoon, Villa 8 puts you at the heart of the country's signature rainforest-meets-ocean landscape-the perfect place to experience everything from ziplining and whitewater rafting to hiking and snorkeling. It's a short drive from two beaches, Marino Ballena National Park and the Nauyaca waterfalls, plus, for dinners out or a little souvenir, it's an easy trip to restaurants and shops in the town of Dominical.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
See what wish fulfillment really looks like at Gouverneur Dream. This exquisitely modern St. Barts vacation rental feels like it has its own private views over the white sand and turquoise water of Gouverneur Beach. It’s no less stunning on the inside, with rooms that use the island’s rock as part of the architecture and plenty of playful artwork.

Your holiday at this dreamy luxury property begins with a meet and greet, an escort to the villa and a welcome gift. Let the days unfurl as you lounge by the heated infinity pool, sip cocktails in the outdoor living area or heat up the gas barbecue for a dinner of fresh local seafood. For active guests, there’s an exercise room; for everyone else, there’s a wine fridge, TV and Wi-Fi.

Two open-concept living areas—one on the pool level and one on the upper floor—give you plenty of space to catch up on reading or catch up with friends and family. Downstairs, you’ll find sitting and dining areas plus a wet bar; upstairs, a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar and a dining area open to an al-fresco sitting area.

Each of the three bedrooms at Gouverneur Dream has a king bed, en-suite bathroom, Apple TV and air conditioning. One of the bedrooms opens to its own terrace, and another has a spa-worthy al-fresco shower. Traditional furnishings and neutral tones in the bedrooms are set off by oversized artwork with cheeky themes.

The villa is a short drive from several of the island’s most popular beaches, including St. Jean Bay, Nikki Beach and Anse des Cayes Beach, where you can take a honeymoon-style stroll along the sand or join the jet set at waterfront clubs. Have dinner or do some shopping in the charming capital, Gustavia, or take a boat ride to the pristine scenery of Saint Barthelemy Nature Reserve.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Relax and enjoy a view of endless Caribbean blue at the edge Villa Amarilla’s infinity pool. Located in Anguilla, this five bedroom architectural gem boasts a décor as beautiful as the island’s natural surroundings, created in collaboration with award-winning interior designer David Salem.

Whether you are basking in the sun in one of the pool’s built-in recliners, enjoying the built-in hot tub’s soothing bubbles or entertaining fellow vacationers, you’ll love the outdoor amenities Villa Amarilla has to offer. Indulge in the island’s fresh seafood with the help of a barbeque grill and shaded terrace, or sip a cocktail by the outdoor bar. Indoors, you will find a home theatre with surround sound, an excercise room and a massage table. Baby equipment is also available, to accommodate the whole family and help you travel light. Housekeeping, concierge and manager services are included with your reservation.

Villa Amarilla’s exterior impresses with yellow stucco walls, terracotta tiles and vast terraces that are perfectly in tune with Anguilla’s sunny coastline. Step inside and you will discover that its vaulted ceilings house a tastefully decorated and well-lit interior vast enough for a large group. A well-equipped kitchen and large center island make preparing the meals you’ll be enjoying in the villa’s spacious indoor and outdoor dining areas a breeze. Alternatively, you can count on our Concierge service to book a private chef for you. A large glass dining table makes Villa Amarilla the perfect place to enjoy a special moment with your loved ones.

Five exquisite bedrooms and six and a half bathrooms accommodate up to ten guests at Villa Amarilla. All of the bedrooms include colorful en-suite bathrooms, air conditioning, ceiling fans and media centers. Three of the suites also feature alfresco showers. Fall asleep to the sound of ocean waves and wake up to nothing but blue skies!

Located on one of Anguilla’s most beautiful reefs, you will never tire of the mesmerizing view of the surf breaking and the panoramic views of Shoal Bay and Scrub Island. Known for its pristine white sand beaches and clear turquoise seas, Anguilla offers a casual island tempo so you can get the rest and relaxation you deserve. Whether on the island for fun in the sun, fine dining, nightlife or watersports, Villa Amarilla offers a one of a kind holiday experience for the Caribbean traveler.

Copyright © 2014 Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Pease Bay House is an exquisite, beachfront villa with some of the most spectacular ocean views on Grand Cayman. With five bedrooms that sleep twelve, and elegant spaces for indoor and outdoor relaxation, it gives elegant privacy to families, groups of friends, and destination wedding guests amid the precious natural beauty of this Caribbean paradise. Accommodations for twelve and benefits from Silver Thatch Guest Services make it an excellent choice for families or large groups of friends seeking a stylish and private alternative to a hotel or resort.

Nestled amid lush island flora, the villa features an ocean-view terrace with infinite swimming pool touching the white sands of your secluded beach. Relish long days relaxing on poolside loungers or swaying in the hammock within the beachside cabana. Enjoy a game of tennis on the villa's private court, then refresh your body and mind in the turquoise sea. In the afternoon, savor cocktails in the comfortable, covered lounge, before gathering around the alfresco dining table for a delicious meal.

From the pool terrace, lovely glass doors open into the villa's interior, where the exquisite décor—including gorgeous furnishings and original artwork—creates an ambience of refined elegance. The ocean-view living room is the perfect setting for evenings with family and friends, while the stunning dining room invites you to epic, nighttime feasts under dazzling chandeliers. The luminous, fully equipped kitchen includes a large breakfast bar and table—an ideal space for savoring bright mornings together.

As you make your way to bed, the upstairs landing greets you with another lounge with office desk. The villa's five bedrooms include three with king beds, one with queen, and one with two twin beds—perfect for kids. The spacious master bedroom includes its own lounge and a private, furnished balcony with beautiful ocean views, as well as an ensuite bathroom with stand-alone rain shower and bathtub; while the other king and queen bedrooms also include ensuite bathrooms and terrace or balcony access. Additionally, there is a double-size pullout couch in the media room, with an ensuite bathroom.

The Lighthouse Restaurant on the South Coast is just a five-minute drive away, while the Botanical Gardens are just ten minutes by car. The town of Savannah is about ten minutes away, and includes Countryside Shopping Plaza for all necessities.

_ Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach. _

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This splendid property is perfectly situated in Santa Carmela, a private gated community in beautiful Cabo San Lucas, B.C.S., Mexico. Villa Renata was featured on the front cover of Florida Design Magazine in the summer of 2014 due to its impressive location and interior design.

This majestic house offers never-to-be-forgotten views of the Sea of Cortez and Pacific Ocean. Experience its elegance within seven bedrooms, seven full bathrooms, four half bathrooms, and a full size kitchen with appliances and utensils. Chill out and enjoy precious time together in the spacious dining and living room or private roof terrace with its outstanding vistas. You can unwind and ease away any stresses by slipping into the hot tub and separate pool, or detox in the sauna and steam room. The house also has a separate maid's quarters with a full bathroom and there's secure parking for up to four cars.

Villa Renata owner Ilda Ledesma collaborated with designer Adriana Hoyos to create a vivid home environment. Throughout a career that spans over 25 years and more than numerous interior design projects, Adriana has created a versatile portfolio of residential, commercial and hospitality projects around the world. Mere words can’t really do the décor and furniture justice. Suffice to say, it’s a truly unique property, the likes of which you’ll have never experienced before. When you want a vacation with the ‘WOW’ factor, you needn’t look any further than your own piece of paradise at Villa Renata.

The seven bedrooms can cater for up to fourteen guests and all are en-suite with four of the seven boasting captivating ocean views. Three of the bedrooms also have access to the impressive terrace which is an idyllic spot to take breakfast and start your day off in style. Three of the bedrooms enjoy king sized beds, and the other bedrooms are fitted with queen beds.

 

Driving out of your gated community, you’ll find Cabo San Lucas to be the nearest hub with many options for dining out, nightlife and shopping. If you’re feeling sporty, there are golf and tennis clubs a short drive away. If relaxing on the beach is more your thing, you have the choice of two excellent beaches – Tabasco and Médano - both less than 9km away from your vacation home. Los Cabos International Airport (SJD) is just less than 40km from Villa Renata.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Hacienda Isla Capitan is a sensational villa within the Nuevo Vallarta resort community on Mexico's Riviera Nayarit. Nestled on an island beside El Tigre Golf Club, this vacation rental offers a sublime blend of tropical seclusion and convenient access to the natural, cultural, and sporting pleasures of this enchanting coastline. Like a private resort unto itself, it offers ample outdoor and indoor living areas, a fine professional staff and services, and five spacious bedrooms accommodating ten guests.

Built by hand of organic materials, the home enjoys a cloistered ambiance amid lush gardens, towering palms, and beautifully masoned stone walls. Enjoy dreamy hours by the lagoon-style saltwater pool, dipping into its refreshing waters, running your head beneath the waterfall, and relaxing on elegant loungers and sunbeds. Relish home cooked feasts alfresco and savor classic Mexican cocktails from the outdoor bar in the evening. After sunset, gather around the fire pit or crawl into the hot tub for a starlit soak in the gentle Pacific air.

Spacious and superbly decorated interiors inspire intimate gatherings with family and friends. An open kitchen with chef-ready appliances serves a comfortable lounge and rustic dining table for ten. Multiple salon areas invite you to relax in a hammock with a favorite book, or share a bottle of fine wine while playing your favorite tunes on the sound system or baby grand piano. The villa is well secured and its water purification system will provide fresh and potable water during your stay. High-end services include a chef and daily massages.

The villa features three suites with king beds and one suite with two queen beds. One of the king suites includes a twin bed as well. Four of the rooms enjoy an ensuite bathroom and include air conditioning and a safe. The structure and décor of each bedroom is unique, but all provide sumptuous sanctuaries for afternoon siestas and peaceful nights.

The villa's island is set within the canals of Nuevo Vallarta, leading out to the Bay of Banderas and Pacific Ocean. Family-friendly beaches, activities, and eco-adventures abound in this area, and the city of Puerto Vallarta is just seventeen kilometers away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
With its breathtaking views of the crystal clear blue waters of the Pacific Ocean’s Bay of Banderas, the naturally lush beauty of the Sierra Madre Mountains, the Marietas islands and the Puerto Vallarta skyline, Casa Kalika oozes ultimate relaxation, contemplative vibes and simple, yet elegant living. Set on the ninth fairway of the famed Jack Nicklaus Golf Course in the exclusive Four Seasons Punta de Mita community, Casa Kalika provides guests with both a coveted location and a private oceanfront setting. Your dream villa awaits!

Casa Kalika has all of the necessary amenities for modern living in a hot climate. With air conditioned bedrooms, Wi-Fi access, satellite television, and a stereo sound system, Casa Kalika offers the key amenities required for every vacation—from a corporate retreat to a honeymoon. Equipped with a staff of four that provides attentive, yet unobtrusive service, you will emerge relaxed and refreshed after your stay. The chef will cater to your culinary requests and the estate manager and concierge will accommodate your whims to make sure your visit is full of leisure, comfort and adventure.

Casa Kalika was built in a contemporary tropical “palapa style” with modern Balinese influences by Architect Guillermo Michel Renteria, one of the most talented emerging architects from Puerto Vallarta. Built with traditional, natural and organic local materials, this impressively restful private villa captures fluid transition between unrestricted spaces and natural beauty. Live the indoor/outdoor experience to its fullest!

With a total of six magnificent bedrooms, this casa can accommodate up to ten guests and two additional children. Each bedroom includes king or double bed, en-suite bathroom with shower, toiletries, air conditioning and a phone. In three of the bedroom suites, enjoy hot tubs and outdoor showers. Unwind at Casa Kalika!

Whether you are relaxing in one of the five master suites, lounging under the open palapa living room, sipping a margarita at the wet bar, swimming in the infinity salt water pool, enjoying a cup of espresso in the state of the art kitchen or dining under the stars on the ocean view roof terrace, Casa Kalika gives a sense of continuous intimacy mixed with organic living. A world class vacation should steal you away just as you desire. A stay at Casa Kalika will do just that!

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Beach vacations are supposed to be relaxing, but if you’re not right on the beach, they can be a little stressful too. The car, the traffic, the packing, it can take some of the fun out. Luckily, Beach Enclave is one of Turks and Caicos most prestigious beachfront resorts, and at this luxurious four-bedroom villa, you’ll be just steps away from their beautiful Sunset Beach, just follow the Beach Path. You won’t have any trouble finding the ocean. From Villa Nine’s elevated perch, you’ll have incredible ocean views from the kitchen, living room, terrace, and every bedroom.

When you have a muse like the Caribbean Sea, you design accordingly. Nearly all of Villa Nine’s interior spaces open, or have views, facing the endless ocean vista. Minimalistic-chic design simplifies the interior. White walls with light colored wood accents create a relaxing vibe. High-end designer furniture and eclectic works of art decorate the common spaces and bedrooms. The kitchen comes equipped with stainless steel appliances and plenty of functional countertop workspace. And, the open-concept layout allows ocean breeze and natural sunlight to flow freely throughout.

Villa Nine has dining space for eight inside and outside. Its sound system, swimming pool, sun loungers, and outdoor living areas make the villa a great social environment, perfect for hosting. The media room, air conditioning, Apple TV, Wi-Fi, and fitness room are ideal for a night in with the family. And, a friendly staff of housekeepers, butlers, and an evening security guard will make your stay even easier.

There’s plenty around Beach Enclave, like golf, national parks, restaurants, shopping, and a marina, you won’t have to travel much more than ten kilometers. There is lots do on-site too. Kayaking, paddle boarding, snorkeling, and yoga are all included with your reservation. The nearby coral reef system makes this area perfect for scuba diving and fishing. If you’d prefer some fun on land, the horseback riding tours of the area come highly recommended.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Gaze upon endless ocean views from this stately house on the eastern tip of Saint Martin’s French side. Work on your vacation tan from one of the poolside sun loungers or settle in for a nap beneath the shaded hammock. At dinner, the alfresco set on the wrap-around terrace is a breezy setting for fresh seafood. Or, drive 10-minutes to Marigot for a wide selection of fusion restaurants.

White-washed exposed-beams support Azur Reve’s extra-tall ceilings and create wide openings to the pool deck. The interior’s simple color palette contrasts Saint Martin’s lush greens and glowing blues in the most idyllic way. Light wood tones and terracotta tiles add another earthy element to remind guests of the beauties beyond. At night, gather around the wet bar for a tropical cocktail. If you’re keeping up with a fitness routine, the exercise room, situated in a separate pavilion, offers another fantastic ocean-view to enjoy while you workout.

Start your day with a round of golf at Mullet Bay, an incredibly scenic course that follows the outline of the Dutch-side bay. After, meet up with the rest of the group on the sandy shores of Baie Rouge, just 4-minutes from home. If you’re in the mood for some duty-free shopping, Marigot, Grand Case, and Philipsburg are all packed with high-end fashion houses. All three cities have vibrant nightlife scenes as well, and the furthest is only 17 kilometers away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Access the best of Punta Mita at Condo Ceres. As part of the exclusive Las Marietas community, this three-bedroom vacation rental offers ocean views, private outdoor living areas, a location close to beaches and golf, and a membership that will get you into the beach clubs and golf courses. Reserve this luxury property for a getaway with friends and family—or an indulgent Mexico honeymoon.

Condo Ceres opens to an expansive terrace with lounging and dining areas, a sound system and an infinity pool, all facing the Pacific Ocean. Inside, the amenities range from a sound system and Wi-Fi to laundry facilities and elevator access. Your holiday also includes a premier membership to the Residents Beach Club, Kupuri Beach Club, Bahia and Pacifico golf courses, nearby tennis courts and a fitness center.

A fold-away glass wall is all that separates the villa’s great room from the terrace, inviting you to open the space for one large indoor-outdoor living area. Watch the ocean—or TV—from one of two sitting areas, gather around the dining table to relive the day’s adventures or perch at the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen for a post-swim snack.

Condo Ceres has two bedrooms with king beds and one bedroom with two double beds. All three bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms, air conditioning and ocean views, and open to furnished balconies.

Thanks to the provided golf cart, it’s easy to get from the condo to nearby attractions. If you’ve come to Punta Mita for sun and sand, the villa is less than a half-mile from the St. Regis Beach Club and a short drive from the Residents and Kupuri beach clubs. For shopping and dining, drive to Punta Mita Village or Sayulita Village; for serious nightlife, spend an evening in downtown Puerto Vallarta.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Enjoy the turquoise Turks and Caicos waters from your own seaside retreat at Villa Osprey. Located in the Silly Creek area of Providenciales, this charming three-bedroom getaway has extensive outdoor spaces and beautifully appointed living areas. With features like a hot tub and a children’s pool, the villa is ideal for romantic stays and family vacations alike.

Situated on an acre of oceanfront land, Villa Osprey takes advantage of its setting with plenty of spots to swim, relax and dine. A large terrace with plenty of chaise longues surrounds the infinity pool, wading pool and hot tub, while a tiki hut-style structure provides a shady spot to grill and dine. A walkway leads to a gazebo perched on a cliff, and down at the shore, you’ll find two kayaks, a private swim deck and a boat dock. For your convenience, the villa is also equipped with baby equipment and Wi-Fi access.

The villa’s soft peach walls curve around the pool in a gentle U-shape, so that nearly every room has an ocean view. The open-plan living and dining room, which opens to the pool terrace, is painted the same soothing pastel shade, and a high ceiling and dark wicker furniture create an airy, tropical vibe. Just off the dining room, the fully equipped kitchen continues the calming palette with white cabinets, cream-colored walls and long stretches of stone countertop.

Each of the three bedrooms at Villa Osprey has an en-suite bathroom, air conditioning, a ceiling fan, and television with DVD player. Two of the bedrooms have king beds and oceanfront terraces; one has its own sitting area as well. The third bedroom has two twin beds, which can be pushed together to form a king bed, and a garden view.

It’s possible to swim from the villa’s private deck, but if you’d like to experience the islands’ famed sandy beaches, you’ll find one just 2 miles away. From the villa’s location in Silly Creek, it’s a 15-minute drive to the hospital and airport, a 20-minute drive to Grace Bay and a fitness center, and 9 miles to the Provo golf club.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Please note that there is construction near the villa. Please enquire with one of our Villa Specialists for further details

Paradisso is an elegant three storey villa situated in South Hills on the exclusive Cap Estate. The villa fuses classic Mediterranean and Caribbean design to create a uniquely stunning home, built to high standard and finished with quality modern furnishings and appliances. You’ll spend hours scanning the panoramic view stretching from the Atlantic to the Caribbean Sea.

When you arrive at the villa, a charming outdoor lounge set under a white pergola will stop you in your tracks. It only gets better. The sun drenched back deck wraps a gorgeous infinity pool whose edge seem to plunge into lush gardens of hibiscus and bougainvillea below. Off the pool another pergola houses a teak deck with chaise longues. An al fresco dining area also offers a great excuse to light the outdoor grill and sizzle up fresh local seafood.

The ground floor houses the kitchen, dining area and living room in an airy, open-concept room that allows Atlantic breezes to flow freely. The granite countertops and top-of-the-line appliances make the kitchen an ideal place to cook up a delicious feast. Join your guests for an aperitif on the attached veranda while stars and lights twinkle beyond.

Three of Paradisso’s four bedrooms are found on the upper floor, opening onto a cozy living room and entertainment system. The fourth room is on the lower ground floor and opens directly onto the pool deck. The Master bedroom has a King size bed with en-suite bathroom including a walk-in shower and jetted tub. Every other room houses a Queen size bed and en-suite bathroom with shower. All rooms feature air conditioning.

Villa Paradisso puts you minutes away from a wealth of adventure. The island’s best golf course is your neighbor and there are several sandy beaches nearby. You’re only 4 miles out of Gros Islet, where you’ll find upscale shops, fine dining and a marina where you can rent a sailboat or organize excursions to Pitons or Sulphur Springs.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Indulge in 5,000 square feet of beachfront luxury at Palm Villa located at Idle Awhile resort's The Villas collection. Tucked beneath the palm trees just off Seven Mile Beach in Negril, this gorgeous vacation rental is only steps from Jamaica’s famed white sands and turquoise waters. Invite up to ten guests for a tropical getaway, family reunion or even a decadent honeymoon at this fully staffed property.

Your holiday at Palm Villa includes the services of a chef, butler and housekeeper, as well as the use of water sports equipment like kayaks and sailboats. Guests over 18 are welcome at the fitness center at the Couples Swept Away resort. Palm Villa also has its own private pool, surrounded by a terrace with plenty of loungers, a breezy outdoor living area and a shaded al-fresco dining room.

The home’s relaxed, open interiors make it easy to socialize or spend a quiet afternoon reading. Open the double-doors or wood-trimmed windows in the living room to let in breezes from the outdoor dining area, stretch out on the comfortable, citrus-hued sectional, or gather around the bar for refreshments. Though chef service is included in your stay, the villa has a fully equipped kitchen with both a breakfast bar and a breakfast nook.

Each of the five bedrooms at Palm Villa has a king bed, en-suite bathroom, private terrace and ocean views. Details like four-poster beds, vaulted ceilings and wicker accent furniture give the bedroom suites an appeal that’s traditional yet comfortable.

Though the oceanfront location, five-star service and thoughtful amenities make it tempting to simply stay at Palm Villa, the property is only a 5-minute walk from shopping, dining and nightlife options. For a stroll on a different beach, make the short drive to Orange Bay; for a uniquely Jamaican experience, head to the colorful waters of Blue Hole Mineral Spring.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Casa Alamanda is a stunning luxury villa within the Lagos del Mar enclave of Punta Mita Resort, on the Riviera Nayarit of Mexico. The home is located within walking distance Lagos del Mar Beach, and your vacation rental includes a Premier Punta Mita Club Membership, with access to world-class golf courses and beach clubs. Designed by Mexican architect Manuel Mestre, the 11,000-square-foot home sits on a half-acre of lush private estate, with a 310-degree view of the Bay of Banderas. Special amenities include an infinity swimming pool, hot tub, steam shower, gourmet kitchen, and superb living and dining areas, while the private staff includes housekeeping. The villa is wheelchair-accessible and air-conditioned, ensuring a comfortable environment for all guests.

The villa's unique design features two main living areas with north and south exposures, maximizing the ocean views. Soothe your body in the elevated hot tub and dip into the refreshing pool. Relax on lounge chairs in the Pacific sun or in the pergola's shade. Sip cool drinks in the veranda or in the inner courtyard lounge, and gather for home-cooked meals in the enchanting breeze.

The main living area opens directly to the pool terrace through multiple glass doorways, breathing the sea-kissed air. The space offers a lovely retreat for afternoon downtime and festive evenings, with an ocean-view lounge area and dining table for twelve. The kitchen is fully equipped with chef-grade appliances and a breakfast bar, and opens directly to the patio. A separate media room with high-end entertainment system is perfect for late-night movies.

The bedrooms are superbly designed and furnished, with exquisite accents of mahogany, onyx, and marble. All enjoy ensuite bathrooms. The master suite includes a king bed, private sitting area, and private balcony with stunning views of the Bay of Banderas and Puerto Vallarta, while the primary guest suite also opens to a private balcony, with views of the Marieta Islands. Two of the other guest suites open directly to the pool terrace.

Casa Alamanda is ideally positioned for enjoying the splendors of Punta Mita, just minutes from the beach, waterfront dining, and the peninsula's two renowned Jack Nicklaus Signature golf courses. Puerto Vallarta is about fifty kilometers away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Built with materials from Indonesia and boasting views of the ocean in two directions, Casa Alang Alang is the perfect marriage of relaxed Balinese style and unforgettable Costa Rican scenery. Built atop a hill near the Tamarindo estuary, the property has views along Playa Grande—including vistas of the sunset over the Pacific—and a location a short walk from the beach and town. Seven suite-style bedrooms, including one in a guest house, make the expansive villa feel like your own private beach resort.

At Casa Alang Alang, wake up each day and enjoy a breakfast that’s already been prepared before stepping outside and deciding which of the two pools will be your first swim of the day. (You also have the choice of a soak in the hot tub.) Sunbathe in the lounge chairs on the deck, nap in the hammock, exercise in the fitness room or book a treatment on the massage table, and send the kids to play on the trampoline or skate on the half-pipe. Rinse off in the outdoor shower before preparing dinner on the barbecue and sitting down to eat at the al-fresco dining area. Though it feels secluded, the villa is fully connected with Apple TV and Wi-Fi.

The villa was designed by California architect Steve Adams to take advantage of the gorgeous views, with living spaces that can be completely opened to the outdoors. In the great room, a vaulted ceiling adds to the breezy feeling, as do woven sofas and chairs with sophisticated charcoal cushions. Just next to the sitting area, the generous ironwood dining table seats everyone in wicker chairs. The fully equipped kitchen is open to the rest of the space, but a separate walk-in pantry allows for storage and prep work.

There are six bedrooms in the main house at Casa Alang Alang and one in the guest house; each has an en-suite bathroom. The main-house master suite has a king bed, walk-in closet, dressing area and its own balcony. There are four other bedrooms with king beds, all of which either open to a terrace or have ocean views. The sixth main-house bedroom has two twin beds, a dressing area and a private balcony. An extra room with five twin beds, an en-suite bathroom, ocean views and even a ping-pong table provides additional accommodations. The guest house has a bedroom with a king bed as well as a lounge area, kitchenette, dining table and private balcony.

If the beach views aren’t enough and you need to put your toes in the sand, it’s a 5-minute walk from the villa to Pangas Beach Club and the town center. The airports closest to Casa Alang Alang are Daniel Oduber International, 43.5 miles away, and Juan Santamaria International, 153 miles away.

Copyright © 2015 Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Palmilla 62 is a luxury villa in the exclusive Corridor region of Los Cabos. With spectacular ocean views, a private pool and spa, access to the world-renowned One & Only Palmilla hotel, and the first Jack Nicklaus golf course in Latin America just minutes away, this four-bedroom vacation rental is simply ideal for families, groups of friends, and destination wedding guests seeking exquisite privacy at the romantic tip of Baja California.

The villa's exterior features an elegant ocean-view terrace surrounding a swimming pool with lovely wall fountain. With loungers, sunbeds, sunbeds, parasols, and a covered lounge area, you'll enjoy long Los Cabos days in the sun and shade, sipping cocktails as you gaze at the azure, palm-framed waters. In the evening, take a delicious soak in the hot tub, and gather around the fire pit when the cooler breezes blow. At dinnertime, pass through classic archways into the lovely portico, where you can relish an alfresco feast.

Wide doors open from the portico into the villa's interior, where the open-plan living area features a beautiful dining table for eight and a cozy lounge facing the mounted television. The kitchen is fully equipped with chef grade appliances and a breakfast bar for three. From the exposed wooden beams, to the beautiful original artwork, to the wrought iron chandelier and exquisite furnishings, the villa's décor evokes the classy naturalism and elegance of Old Mexico.

The bedrooms are luminous, comfortable, and furnished with sumptuous simplicity. Both of the master bedrooms feature a king size bed, a walk-in closet, and a glass door opening to a covered patio with ocean view; and their ensuite bathrooms include stand-alone showers and bathtubs. The third and fourth bedrooms also have king size beds, and ensuite bathrooms with stand-alone showers.

Palmilla 62 is ideally situated for savoring Los Cabos and the exclusive Palmilla community. Walk five minutes to Palmilla Beach, or ride the golf cart to the One & Only Palmilla, world-famous for its amenities and unparalleled service. The Palmilla Golf Course is also just 10 minutes away by golf cart. Beyond Palmilla, spend an afternoon in the nearby bohemian town of San José del Cabo, or drive along the coast to enjoy the famous nightlife of Cabo San Lucas.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
The mountains of Tortola shelter this charming villa amidst a sea of green foliage, with fantastic views of the blue Caribbean. Almost every room of the villa grants an invigorating sea view, while guests use the crystal-clear infinity pool as a central meeting point. The sunset-oriented dining area and comfortable living room welcomes guests home after beach days and exciting island outings.  

From the poolside recliners of this next-level Caribbean villa, guests can watch the combing waves drift into the serene shore below. Presented with this panorama of green trees, golden sands and blue seawater, guests can experience true peace as the early fog lifts off the nearby hillsides and flights of doves emerge from the forest. During the warm day, the air-conditioned rooms of the villa makes for the perfect nap and relaxation area, while the provided barbecue, outdoor dining areas and excellently-outfitted kitchen ensure that evening meals are a pleasure to prepare and savor, while the welcoming ensuite bathrooms are a godsend after an active day on the beaches or in the small towns of the north coast.

Villa Aja is a peaceful and secluded option, but retains excellent access to some of the island’s finest attractions. The markets, premium restaurants and music-filled bars of Road Town are just a fifteen minute drive away through the green hills, while guests can hit the north coast road to enjoy a new pristine beach every day, as a chain of fine beaches dot the coastline to the east and west. The sea itself provides a fantastic resource, with guided cruises, outings and diving trips available, ranging from speedboat tours of the dramatic coast, to underwater snorkeling, with guests getting intimately acquainted with the region’s marine life. The while walls, creature comforts and soft beds of Villa Aja will welcome home happy and tired guests after every packed day.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Experience a Carribean dream in one of the three delightful, linked homes of this verdant hillside property. Overlooking sapphire-blue Smuggler’s Cove, guests will love the coral-tiled terrace, ideal for pool parties, barbecues and wet-bar fun. Offering premium comfort and sea-view serenity, it’s an ideal home base after a day of swimming, diving or enjoying the beach bars of Tortola’s West End.

Cohoba House is a great choice for groups that are looking for privacy for individual families, couples or groups, while sharing a great communal space. Throw open the shutters of the three villas to take in the breathtaking scenery, as the blue seascape below collides with brilliant golden sands. With the property featuring sheltered but airy alfresco dining areas, private balconies, welcoming wood-lined bedrooms and deck doors that just ask to be thrown open, guests can relax and embrace the sea breeze and Carribean sunshine in the best of surroundings. Acting as a secluded enclave on the hillside, guests can be assured of privacy and a peaceful atmosphere.

Being located at the western tip of Tortola, guests can choose from a wealth of day-trip and nighttime options. The proximity of Smuggler’s Cove ensures that guests of all ages can experience one of the British Virgin Island’s finest beaches, sheltered on three sides by green hillsides and overlaid by swaying palm trees. Other options include taking a refreshing day cruise by yacht into the great blue yonder, a heart-racing power boat outing, or engaging in a fascinating day dive into the blue world offshore, where schools of tropical fish, coral reefs and rays await. After unwinding with a tropical drink in one of the relaxed local bars, return to the villa’s private balcony or expansive terrace for rest, relaxation and conversation as the sun dips into the sea to the west.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Nestled into the lush hillside jungle of Playa Flamingo, with incredible ocean views, and its own private staircase down to Flamingo Beach, this gorgeous four-bedroom celebrates Costa Rica’s natural environment in style. Within Villa de Oro’s gated property, you’ll love exploring the vibrant gardens, and relaxing in the shade of mature palm trees. Nearby, you’ll find golf, public beachfront, and the beautiful city of Tamarindo.

At first glance, with its white exterior and lovely archways, you’d think Villa de Oro was a tropical palace, and you wouldn’t be far off. Utilizing the luxurious architecture style of the Spanish colonial revival, Villa de Oro takes coastal elegance to a new level. Thoughtfully adorned with the most lavish and intricate local crafts, textures, and furniture, you’re sure to appreciate Villa de Oro’s authenticity. Splashes of ocean-inspired color mix with gorgeous wood tones, and ornate fixtures to create a space that feels light, breezy, chic, and formal all at the same time.

Outside, the hay-thatched palapa acts more like a second mini-villa with its lounge, dining area, and kitchenette with a fridge, sink, and built-in barbecue. In front of the palapa, facing the ocean view, you’ll find sun loungers and the refreshing infinity swimming pool. It doesn’t get much more relaxing than that. Back inside, there’s formal dining for eight, satellite television, air conditioning, and Wi-Fi.

The nearest beach is, of course, Flamingo Beach, just a few steps down Villa de Oro’s private stairway. Once there, you’ll love the secluded atmosphere, calm waters, and pristine sand. If you’d like to visit other beaches in the area, Playa Potrero is just four-kilometers. If there’s a golfer in your group, Reserva Conchal Golf Course is only eight-kilometers from home, with holes featuring scenic ocean and jungle views. And, travel a little further, and you’ll hit Tamarindo. A vibrant city, rich with shopping, restaurants, and exciting nightlife, you’re sure to fall in love with Tamarindo.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
The waves crash and the sun shines outside Casa La Laguna nearly every day of the year. See for yourself on a dreamy holiday at this Los Cabos vacation rental, which is set just steps from the beach in the El Encanto area just outside the town of San Jose del Cabo. Let the villa’s staff pamper you and up to seventeen friends or family members at this seven-bedroom luxury property.

Your stay at Casa La Laguna includes daily chef and housekeeping service, butler service every afternoon and evening, and in-villa concierge assistance. But you’ll hardly need the staff’s help to appreciate resort-worthy outdoor living areas with a heated infinity pool, hot tub, palapa-covered bar and sound system, plus a waterslide, wading pool and pool toys for the kids. Linger outside in the evenings by the firepits and al-fresco dining areas, or enjoy the indoor home theater and spa area.

The villa’s hacienda-inspired interiors feature charming details from beamed ceilings and arched doorways to ornately carved furniture. An open-plan great room with a sitting area, wet bar, dining area and a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar makes it easy for everyone to gather together, while a separate living room is a quieter place to read or nap.

The casa has two bedrooms with king beds and five bedrooms with queen beds; all seven bedrooms have private en-suite bathrooms and ocean views. Wicker accent pieces and vibrant artwork lend personality to each of the suites.

The villa’s incredible location offers direct access to the beach, meaning that a morning yoga session, sand castle building contest or honeymoon-style stroll are always just steps away. It’s also a short drive to the challenging Puerto Los Cabos Golf Course, a marina offering cruises and fishing charters, and the art galleries and restaurants of San Jose del Cabo.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Stretch out in the sunbed at sunset, gazing out over the canopy on to the Pacific at this modern villa in Santa Teresa. Prefer a little more privacy? Retreat to the bedroom, and enjoy the view from the master’s balcony. Or if you’re in the mood to party, play bartender on the terrace. In the morning, visit The Bakery for a French-inspired brunch.

Minimalistic-decor allows Costa Rica’s natural beauty to shine through Casa Noa’s airy interior. Palm trees, contemporary furnishings, and a thoughtful collection of abstract art form an environment that is perfect for hosting, yet smaller enclaves provide getaway spots when desired. On Noa’s interior side, you’ll find a private lawn for a picnic lunch and a bocce court.

Afternoons at Casa Noas were made for refreshing swims in the pool, barbequing, and naps in the hammock. The alfresco set is always reading to host the group for a meal, or you could keep it casual and take a plate to the outdoor lounge and bar area. The villa comes with 2 covered parking spaces within the gated property, as well as daily housekeeping and a concierge.

Along Santa Teresa’s peninsula, you’ll find a string of pristine beaches, all with their own characters to discover. Forbes Magazine has declared the Malpais/Santa Teresa area to have the “Top 10 Most Breathtaking Beaches”. If you feel like dancing, Coco Loco is a favorite nightclub among locals, featuring live music and DJs at its beachfront setting. And, for dinner, Product C is the spot for fresh seafood.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
_ Please note that this property only accepts bookings with arrival dates within the 6 coming months. _

Perched atop the exclusive Cap Estate, Villa Kessi presents sweeping views of St. Lucia’s landscape. You’ll feel positively royal as you survey your kingdom from the Atlantic Ocean, across lush green countryside to the Caribbean Sea. Kessi’s contemporary design and layout display the best of island architecture: vaulted ceilings, wooden flooring, long veranda, jalousie windows, plus wooden balconies featuring hand-carved details.

A tiled deck presents the perfect location for soaking up sun from a chaise longue. Cool off in the tranquil infinity pool that offers stunning views of the island’s only 18-hole golf course. A long veranda runs the width of the house and its cozy rattan lounge set is ideal for enjoying a good book in the shade: the adjacent hammock is also a tempting choice. When the cocktail hour arrives, gather your guests around the regulation billiard table for a quick tournament.

Inside, the main room’s open plan attracts those famous island trade winds, with a little help from large French doors and windows. The living room area, complete with tropical decor, is ideal for socializing or spending a quiet moment contemplating the view. The modern kitchen will get your culinary creative juices flowing. Start your day at the charming breakfast bar and finish it around an elegant dining table.

Two of Kessi’s three bedrooms are found on the main floor. The first has a King size bed and the second has a King size bed and a Twin size bunk bed, making it ideal for children. Both open onto the veranda. The Master suite occupies the upper floor and is luxuriously furnished with a four-poster Super King size bed and wooden louver windows. It opens onto a private balcony with a panoramic view. All bedrooms feature en-suite bathrooms and air conditioning.

Cap Estate puts you minutes away from a wealth of adventure. The island’s best golf course is your neighbor and there are several sandy beaches nearby. You’re only 6.4 km out of Rodney Bay, where you’ll find upscale shops, fine dining and a marina where you can rent a sailboat or organize excursions to Pitons or Sulphur Springs.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Countless islands dot the turquoise waters in front of this newly built villa on the shores of Chalk Sound. Intricately veined marble and an undulating wood ceiling reflect the shapes of the waves, while polished stone floors reflect the Caribbean sunshine. Take the kayaks out to spot fish in the sound and drive to equally picture-perfect Sapodilla Bay or Taylor Bay for some white-sand beach time. 

You’ll have to decide if the ocean views are best enjoyed from the swimming pool, the row of loungers by the pool, or the al-fresco dining area on the deck of this Turks and Caicos vacation rental. (There’s also a second outdoor dining table.) Pour a glass from the wine fridge to sip as you grill local seafood on the barbecue, and finish the day in front of the smart TV, Sonos sound system, or Wi-Fi. 

A wall of fold-away glass is all that separates the oceanfront deck from the villa’s great room, giving you the luxury of opening up one seamless indoor-outdoor living space. Cool stone floors link a sitting area with a sleek white sectional, a dining table for 10, and a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar and a dramatic marble backsplash. 

Alainn Villa has 2 bedrooms with king beds and private en-suite bathrooms, including a honeymoon-worthy master suite with ocean views and direct access to the pool. The other 2 bedrooms are ideal for a family traveling with younger children, with queen beds and a Jack and Jill bathroom that’s accessible from both rooms. 

Explore by land and by sea using the villa’s provided bicycles and kayaks. By car, it’s a 6-minute drive to some of the best beaches on Providenciales, including Sapodilla Bay Beach and Taylor Bay Beach. If you’re hungry from all the swimming, paddling, cycling, or relaxing you’ve done on holiday, it’s also a short drive to island-favorite restaurants like Las Brisas and Bugaloo’s. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Perch at the edge of the waves in contemporary style at Pelican. This newly built St. Barts vacation rental is set just above the Anse des Lézards, with views over the ocean to the green hillsides of the island. Spacious, thoughtfully designed interiors and four suite-style bedrooms can welcome up to eight friends or family members to this tropical idyll—but can also be reserved for a more private, honeymoon-style Caribbean getaway.

Listen to the waves and feel the sea spray from an oceanfront terrace with an infinity pool, plenty of sun beds and loungers for soaking in the rays, an al-fresco living area and a gas barbecue. The villa also has a satellite TV, sound system, Wi-Fi and wine cooler to entertain you in the evenings.

Sun streams into the villa through the glass wall that fronts the great room, and light bounces off the vaulted ceiling. The open-concept space features a relaxed sitting area, a dining area that seats eight and a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar. If you’d like, slide open the doors to the terrace to let the warm island breezes waft through the house.

Each of the four bedrooms at this luxury property has a king bed, en-suite bathroom, TV and air conditioning. Two of the bedrooms have ocean views and terraces, and the other two look out over the garden.

A holiday at Pelican puts you only a 2-minute drive from the nearest beach at Anse des Cayes and a 5-minute drive from Saint Jean Beach. The villa is also a 5-minute drive from the nearest restaurant, for nights when you’d rather dine out, and a 10-minute drive from Gustavia, the island’s charming capital and home to a host of other shopping and dining options.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Situated within the prestigious Casa de Campo Resort, this luxurious five bedroom is a sportsman’s dream, with Teeth of the Dog and Dye Fore golf courses intertwining with the resort’s beautiful estate. Ten minutes away, you’ll be able to visit one of the Dominican’s most beautiful beaches, Playa Minitas. Back home, you and your guests will love Vista Chavon’s lush terrace, decorated with Caribbean greenery, mature palm trees, and two refreshing swimming pools.

Combining stately Caribbean architecture with an open-air floor plan allows Vista Chavon to invite the beautiful environment of the Dominican Republic to flow freely within its luxurious walls. Extra-high ceilings and a spacious, open-concept layout enhance the breezy atmosphere, while deep wood tones and intricate stonework add an elegant warmth to the equation. In the kitchen, you’re sure to appreciate the state of the art stainless steel appliances and bright, functional working environment. Throughout the interior and exterior, you’ll find large living areas for group gatherings, as well as smaller nooks that are perfect for intimate occasions. And, each bedroom is outfitted with a king or a pair of twin sized beds, and a lavish en-suite bathroom.

Vista Chavon’s terrace is the perfect setting for an unforgettable dinner party, with an outdoor kitchen, barbecue, and alfresco dining set. And, the villa’s two swimming pools, hot tub, hammocks, and furnished outdoor lounge ensure that everyone in the group has a comfortable space to make their own.

The heart of Casa de Campo is Minitas Beach, located just ten minutes from Vista Chavon. There, you’ll find pristine white sand and crystal clear waters, ideal for first-time snorkelers, kayaking, and other watersports. If there’s a golf aficionado in the group, Teeth of the Dog is a must-play course that consistently ranks amongst the “Top One-Hundred Courses in the World,” according to Golf Magazine. On the resort, you’ll also be able to enjoy their many restaurants, spa and tennis facilities, and vibrant Marina community, where you can charter a fishing trip, yacht rental, or just enjoy the seaside atmosphere.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Follow a secret staircase to a bedroom suite or palapa for two at this colorful retreat perched over the Jalisco coast. The infinity pool, rooftop terraces, and open-sided living area make the most of the Pacific panoramas from this fully staffed villa. Walk down to local institution Playa Rosa Beach Club for ceviche and cocktails with your sunset views, then ride the funicular back up to bed. 

Stretch out in loungers in the sun and shade on the ocean-view terrace before cooling off in the infinity pool or sitting down to dinner at the al-fresco table for 8. There’s even a hammock and swing to help you slow to the rhythm of a holiday. After sunset, stargaze from the rooftop terraces or turn to the smart TV and Wi-Fi for entertainment. 

From the palapa roof over the great room and the tree-like beams holding it up to the potted palms growing indoors, this vacation rental brings nature inside for a feeling of organic luxury. Flower-inspired pops of pink, coral, and teal add to the vibe in the open-concept living and dining room, as do polished wood cabinets in the fully equipped kitchen. 

There are 3 bedrooms in the main house at Constellation Dragon: 2 with king beds, and one with 2 double beds. The fourth bedroom has a king bed and is in a separate suite reached by hidden staircase, making it perfect for a couple reliving their honeymoon. All 4 bedrooms have private en-suite bathrooms. 

The villa is part of the exclusive Costa Careyes resort, designed to be a Mediterranean-inspired hideaway on the Pacific coast of Mexico. Today, this Costalegre retreat is a haven of intriguing art and architecture, great restaurants, and family-friendly beaches—the closest of which is just a short ways downhill from the villa. Make new friends at El Careyes Club or Careyes Polo Club, and be sure to ask about their favorite wonders, as the local art installations are known. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Located just off the shore of Tulum Beach amongst lush tropical jungle, Casa Chechen is the perfect secluded getaway for a honeymoon or family vacation. At Chechen, you’ll be able to walk barefoot from the villa to the beach in just a few steps through the jungle pathway. This authentic beach villa features two en-suite bedrooms and relaxing interiors sure to fulfill your beach vacation dreams. Nearby, you’ll have plenty of historical sites, natural wonders, and local restaurants and shopping to discover all around Mexico’s Yucatan Peninsula.

Jungle style mixes with contemporary architecture in this warm beach house. Wood and stone construction materials have been locally sourced to maintain an authenticity that is simply unduplicated. And with several small lounge areas, you’ll have plenty of space for group gatherings, as well as space to break off for more intimate moments.

Casa Chechen comes with a fully equipped kitchen and dining space for four inside. The villa also includes daily American style breakfast, house keeping, air conditioning and Wi-Fi to keep guests cool and connected. Outside, you’ll have everything you need for your relaxing beachfront getaway. Sun beds, hammocks, lounge chairs, and lush tropical gardens are all placed throughout the secluded outdoor area.

Whether you’re looking for a secluded stretch to stroll along or a beachfront bar to enjoy a cocktail at, the Yucatan Peninsula has the perfect beach for you. Secret Beach is an absolutely gorgeous and unpopulated paradise that truly lives up to its name. Akumai Beach is perfect for nightlife with its vibrant atmosphere and sandy coast lined with open-air bars and restaurants. If you’re in the mood to explore, Cenotes Sac Actum is a company that specializes in diving tours of underwater caves and coral reef systems. If you’d like to make a new friend, Dolphinaris lets you get up close and personal with the Ocean’s most friendly creature. And, no trip to Mexico is complete without a visit to the ancient Mayan City of Tulum.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach.

listing.listing_description:
Escape to a place with nothing around but the jungle and ocean at The Jade House. Tucked into the forest in Escaleras, between the beach towns of Dominical and Uvita, this ingeniously designed Costa Rica vacation rental is the spot to make holiday memories with friends and family. And with five bedrooms, there’s room for up to ten people to be part of the fun.

The warm breezes and tropical sunshine are perhaps best enjoyed from outdoor living areas with an infinity pool, swim-up bar, kitchen area with a wet bar, a barbecue, and shaded sitting and dining areas. After watching the sunset over the Pacific, spend a quiet evening inside around the cable TV, Wi-Fi and pool table.

Thanks to fold-away glass doors and an open-concept layout, the warm breezes and ocean views even reach inside The Jade House. The great room, with its sitting area, dining area for ten and fully equipped kitchen, is spacious and inviting. High ceilings and modern furnishings only add to the appeal.

There are four bedrooms with ensuite bathrooms and ocean views at this luxury property: one with a king bed and three with queen beds. The fifth bedroom has two twin beds and a shared bathroom. For families traveling with kids, there’s also an additional room—accessed through a passageway hidden behind a bookcase—with three twin bunk beds and an ensuite half-bathroom.

Though it feels like a private hideaway, The Jade House is close enough to popular beaches and national parks for a day trip. It’s only a short drive from the villa to Playa Dominicalito, where you can try out surfing, and Playa Uvita, where you can relive your honeymoon on the beautiful white sands. Don’t miss shopping and dining in the town of Dominical, whale-watching in Marino Ballena National Park or the incredible scenery in Manuel Antonio National Park.

listing.listing_description:
Gwynt A Mor, the welsh rendition for Wind and Sea, spans almost 2 acres and enjoys spactacular elevated views.

A private gated entrance and private driveway lead to this beautifully orchestrated villa built by one of the leading constructions companies in the TCI. The approximately 5,000 square feet of patio surround the house and the multi-level family friendly pool, tennis court with basketball area plus a popular fire pit, provide amenities for an active Caribbean Lifestyle.

The stunning panoramic views from this Caribbean style villa, on the highest point of the north shore, could only be improved if airborne. Sweeping views from the North West Point resort to Parrot Cay need to be seen to be believed.

Impeccable detail throughout and elegant furnishings with a traditional flair, the main residence enjoys 4 bedrooms, a spacious light and airy living area, an exquisite kitchen and dining area along with a media/games room.

8 foot Spanish cedar doors, LED lighting, GE Monogram appliances and Egyptian limestone tiles throughout with travertine tiles in the bathrooms are just some of the special finishing’s which enhance this superb villa.
